mapper.select:
select b.article_no, b.user_id, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, m.user_name, r.reboard_no, r.group_no, r.depth, r.step, r.parent_no, r.reply from board b join users m on b.user_id = m.user_id join reboard r on b.article_no = r.article_no where b.bcode = #{bcode}
order by r.group_no desc, r.step limit #{start}, #{listsize}
mapper.insert:
